spec-documentation.title: Project and Technical Documentation
spec-documentation.description: We help you structure your digital product before development starts. You get detailed specifications, clear architecture, technology choices, and timelines — everything needed to plan, estimate, and launch development with confidence.
spec-documentation.whenDoYouNeedIt: When you're preparing to build a digital product and need well-structured, technically sound project documentation that reflects best engineering practices. This documentation becomes the foundation for estimating timelines and budgets, aligning all stakeholders, and ensuring your development team has a clear and actionable roadmap.

items.title: Understanding the product and goals
items.text: We start with interviews and goal analysis to define a sound product structure and scope.

items.title: System and process design
items.text: We design user flows, screen maps, and API structure. We define entities and business modules.

items.title: Tech stack and architecture choice
items.text: We select technologies and structure your app based on scalability, budget, and resources.

items.title: Development plan and milestones
items.text: You get a comprehensive project plan with clear phases, deliverables, and implementation timelines.

spec-documentation.result: You receive detailed documentation that serves as a blueprint for development. This includes technical specifications, user flows, architecture diagrams, and a structured development plan. The documentation helps minimize risks, avoid scope creep, and ensures everyone — developers, designers, and stakeholders — is aligned on the vision and execution strategy.

documentation-audit.title: Documentation Audit and Optimization
documentation-audit.description: We analyze your existing project documentation to identify gaps, inconsistencies, and improvement opportunities. You get actionable recommendations to enhance clarity, completeness, and usability of your technical and project documentation.
documentation-audit.whenDoYouNeedIt: When you have existing documentation that feels incomplete, outdated, or difficult to navigate. Perfect for teams struggling with knowledge gaps, onboarding challenges, or development bottlenecks caused by unclear specifications.

items.title: Comprehensive documentation review
items.text: We analyze all existing docs: technical specs, user guides, API documentation, and process documents.

items.title: Gap analysis and recommendations
items.text: Identify missing information, outdated content, and areas where clarity can be improved.

items.title: Structure and organization optimization
items.text: Reorganize content for better navigation, searchability, and logical flow of information.

items.title: Implementation roadmap
items.text: Step-by-step plan for implementing improvements with priority levels and estimated effort.

documentation-audit.result: You receive a detailed audit report with specific recommendations, reorganized content structure, and a clear implementation plan. This leads to more efficient team collaboration, faster onboarding, reduced support requests, and smoother development processes.

items.title: User experience design

items.title: Security and performance optimization
items.text: Built-in security measures, performance optimization, and scalability planning from day one.

items.title: Testing and deployment
items.text: Comprehensive testing, CI/CD setup, and deployment to your preferred hosting environment.

web-app-development.result: A production-ready web application tailored to your specific requirements. Includes source code, deployment setup, comprehensive documentation, and training for your team. Built with scalability in mind to grow with your business.
